headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Lam Research After Its 2024 AI Fueled Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Lam Research is still worth buying after its massive run, you are not alone. This article will help you cut through the noise around its valuation. The stock has pulled back around 7.9% over the last week, but is still up about 5.1% over 30 days and an eye catching 113.9% year to date, after more than doubling with a 108.0% gain over the last year and rising 257.1% over three years. Those moves sit against a backdrop of intense interest in semiconductor equipment...

headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) jumped 5.9% in the morning session after several analysts raised their price targets on the stock, citing confidence in the company's outlook.

raw.headline: Why Lam Research (LRCX) Stock Is Up Today
raw.summary: Shares of semiconductor equipment maker Lam Research (NASDAQ:LRCX) jumped 5.9% in the morning session after several analysts raised their price targets on the stock, citing confidence in the company's outlook.

headline: Lam Research price target raised to $200 from $170 at Mizuho
summary: Mizuho analyst Vijay Rakesh raised the firm’s price target on Lam Research (LRCX) to $200 from $170 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm sees upside to 2026 wafter fab equipment estimate. headline: Applied Materials: Engineering the AI Backbone
summary: The company is entering a powerful AI-driven up-cycle with record margins and strong execution, yet still trades at an unjustified discount to peers.

headline: 1 Momentum  Stock with Impressive Fundamentals and 2 We Brush Off
summary: The stocks featured in this article have all approached their 52-week highs. When these price levels hit, it typically signals strong business execution, positive market sentiment, or significant industry tailwinds.
